summary: The story is about Amber, a mean popular girl who gets electrocuted and dies and is not allowed to enter into heaven unless she helps the least popular girl in school become Prom Queen within a week, but things do not go as planned.
cast: Cassandra Scerbo|Carissa Capobianco|Gabriela Lopez|Katrina Rose Tandy|Lindsey Shaw|Katie Sarife|Travis Quentin Young|Paras Patel|Cree Ivey|Andrea Powell|Rhoda Griffis|Chris Zylka|Allen Williamson|Lucius Baston|Tim Gunn|Ben Winchell|Elena Varela|John Keenan|Langley McArol|Heidi Heller|Ariel Bryan|Katie Garner|Quinten Johnson|Rachael Lang|Caylan J. McKay|Cullen Moss|Jennifer Murphy|Windy Wagner
title: Teen Spirit
